attributes.action: Create a Homeland Security Department to preserve our freedoms
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Create a U.S style Homeland Security Department that deals with all the UK's security issues effectivly.

The scope including:-

* Critical infrastructure protection

* Immigration & Border Security

* Emergency preparedness & response
  (For natural disasters & terrorism)

* Detection of nuclear and
  radiological materials

* Transportation security
  (aviation and maritime)
